plot: This film tells the story of Karsløya, a remote Island in the north of Norway. Karlsøye is a mixture of people from everywhere. All with their dreams and hope for the future.
title: Karlsøya - mellom geiter, rock & Muhammed
plot_es: This film tells the story of Karsløya, a remote Island in the north of Norway. Karlsøye is a mixture of people from everywhere. All with their dreams and hope for the future.
